parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name to be created.

parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description:
The frontend port of the HTTPS listener.

Value range:** 1 to 65535**

parameters.name: LoadBalancerId
parameters.description: The ID of the SLB instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the SLB instance belongs.

parameters.name: ServerCertificateId
parameters.description: The ID of the certificate used by the domain name.
